fields.headline: What's hot
fields.bodyText: Champagne reception Leila Menchari, design director of Hermès, is creating a champagne and caviar bar in the harbour-front lobby of Monte Carlo's Port Palace hotel. It is the final flourish to Monaco's newest hotel, the only five-star property in the principality to have a contemporary style. All 50 suites and studios overlook the harbour and the Grimaldi palace. · Junior suites cost from €600 (£416) at the Port Palace (00 377 97 97 90 00, portpalace.com). Country living A 14th-century Catalan country house, part of a castle and its watermill in a pretty village 20 miles from Gerona, has been restored as a five-bedroom home now available for holiday rental. The original stone staircase, gothic windows, vaulted ceilings and wooden beams have been retained at Mas Corney; a covered outdoor living area leads to a semi-circular swimming pool overlooking farmland. · A week's rental of Mas Corney, which sleeps up to eight adults plus two children, costs from £2,887 including car hire with The Individual Travellers Spain (08700 773773, indiv-travellers.com). Flights to Barcelona can be arranged from £93 return including taxes. Caffè society Venice's historic Caffè Florian is to be recreated in Edinburgh for a month in the spring. A replica of the caffè's Chinese Room is being shipped to the Howard Hotel in Edinburgh's New Town; during March, chefs and waiters from the Florian will serve coffee, pastries and the famous hot chocolate. · The Howard (0131-557 3500, thehoward.com) has a special package and two nights' B&B with afternoon tea at the Florian for £100pp per night.
